It only requires Steam installed in order to run (it won't appear in Steam as a bought game - in fact you don't even have to run the Steam application). Edit "LumaEmu.ini" in the game folder to change the player name.

For those who have Windows 7 and can't even get hkship.exe to show up, just right click, properties, and then disable compatability mode. I think the up-loader might have enabled it during the upload.
